title: The Crossroads of Should and Must: Find and Follow Your Passion
description: There are two paths in life: Should & Must.We arrive at this crossroads over and over again, and every day. And we get to choose.Starting out or starting over, making a career change or making a life change, the most life-affirming thing you can do is to honor the voice inside that says your have something special to give, and then heed the call and act. Many have traveled this road before. Hereâ€™s how you can, too. #choosemustAn inspirational gift book for every recent graduate, every artist, every seeker, and every career change.
author: Elle Luna
